channel.title: Broken Stairs

item.title: Broken Stairs
item.dc:creator: @jungledude jungledude
item.description:
@jungledude wrote:

case 4417:   // Castle wars stairs up Made by Newton378
if (heightLevel = 0) {
teleportToX = 2420;
teleportToY = 3080;
heightLevel = 1;
}
if (heightLevel = 1) {
teleportToX = 2430;
teleportToY = 3080;
heightLevel = 2;
}
if (heightLevel = 2) {
teleportToX = 2426;
teleportToY = 3074;
heightLevel = 3;
}
break;

Just a guess

[quote=“domServer, post:2, topic:136345”]dude your not spossed to make it if (absx or if absy
its spossed to be diffrest stairs and look like this

case 4417: // Castle wars stairs up Made by Newton378 teleportToX = 2420; teleportToY = 3080; heightLevel = 1; } [/quote]

Lololololol not if it’s the same object id stupid…

item.title: Broken Stairs
item.dc:creator: @newton37 newton37
item.description:
@newton37 wrote:

I’m coding Castle Wars for my server, and the 3rd set of stairs that take you to the saradomin flag, well, they don’t take you to the flag. Here’s a Ex. of what I coded for the stairs:

case 4417: // Castle wars stairs up Made by Newton378 if (absX == 2419) { teleportToX = 2420; teleportToY = 3080; heightLevel = 1; } if (absY == 3081) { teleportToX = 2430; teleportToY = 3080; heightLevel = 2; } if (absX == 2425) { teleportToX = 2426; teleportToY = 3074; heightLevel = 3; } break;

Now when I click the stairs, they don’t take me anywhere. If anyone knows how to fix this, please help me.

Note: these are only the saradomin stairs.

Read full topic
